PROMINENT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.damage: Your total damage per second in an ideal situation, including any damage affecting attributes or talents, except Holy/Spiteful/Baneful
PROMINENT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.defense: Your total protection level including armour, resistance and block chance
PROMINENT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.greed: Your total Greed levels - gained after reaching max level

MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:block: Your chance to block any incoming damage
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:cooldown_reduction: Your cooldown reduction to use skills
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:critical_hit_chance: Your chance to hit a crticial hit
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:damage_increase: Your total amout of extra damage
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:fatal_strike_chance: Your chance to land a fatal strike
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:health: Your total amount of healt points
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:reach: The blocks you can reach from standing
MOD_GEAR_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTIONS.the_vault:sweeping_hit_chance: Your chance to land a sweeping hit

VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.treasure_rooms_opened: The total number of treasure rooms you've opened.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.crystals_crafted: The total number of Vault Crystals you've crafted.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.vaults_total: The total number of vaults you've run.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.vaults_completed: The total number of vaults you've successfully completed.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.vaults_bailed: The total number of vaults you've bailed.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.vaults_failed: The total number of vaults you've failed.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.experience: The total vault experience you've gained.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.damage_dealt: The total amount of damage you've dealt in vaults.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.damage_taken: The total amount of damage you've taken in vaults.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.mobs_unalived: The total number of mobs you've unalived in vaults.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.blocks_mined: The total number of blocks you've mined in vaults.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.trapped_chests: The total number of trapped chests you've opened in vaults.
VAULT_STATS_DESCRIPTIONS.chests_looted: The total number of chests you've looted in vaults.
